pages.text: While introspective your focus is in your Mindscape. Each Inner realm begins as a certain volume of space. The Ego Membranes define the limits of your inner realm.

In each Ego Membrane wall there will be an Astral Meridian block which can be used with Keys of Enlightenment to expand your sense of self and give you more room and you can shift right click them with an empty hand to leave and return your focus to your body.

While in your Inner Realm you have access to your Astral Inventory with the resources gathered from $(l:etheric_isles)Etheric Isles$(/l) and the creatures which live among them. Some resources can be transferred from the waking world via the Offering Brazier.
These resources are needed to create Mental Constructs.
